channel.title: Shield of Curruption
channel.description:
ok... i made this shield because i got an idea of it in my head and i made it... sorry if its too simple for you and i only used 3 prims in it (for the handle) and yes i know.. prims make it easier but what i wanted to make didnt really involve using them
[IMG]http://i1183.photobucket.com/albums/x470/0acer0/soc-front.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i1183.photobucket.com/albums/x470/0acer0/soc-wirefram.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i1183.photobucket.com/albums/x470/0acer0/soc-frame2.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i1183.photobucket.com/albums/x470/0acer0/soc-frame.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i1183.photobucket.com/albums/x470/0acer0/soc-datmaker.jpg[/img]

item.title: Shield of Curruption
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

Make a shield that has 1500 faces and no poly over kill. Which means don’t make a sphere have 600 faces. Make the concept art complex. Also make the shield bubble out instead of this easy, select the outside vertices and move down, stuff.

Read full topic

item.title: Shield of Curruption
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

[quote=“h1 sk1ller, post:29, topic:378954”][quote author=amy_webb link=topic=474810.msg3472905#msg3472905 date=1295424836]

Amy, please just listen. We are commenting because we are trying to help you it may be annoying but we all use them and trust me it is better to use them, and yes shields need primitives too. Not just swords.

k well i made acouple normal shields before just to test out prims on a shield and all that… they are kites and all but i wont be posting them
[/quote]

Ok, just post the best models you make we don’t always post every single model of ours we want to see your best work and I’m sure there will be alot of it you have potential.[/quote]
sad thing is i dont know what my best work is im to critical on the models i make and i neverseem to be happy with them

Read full topic

item.title: Shield of Curruption
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:

i know they make it cleaner but on a shield you dont really need to
[/quote]
You always want a clean wireframe.[/quote]
of corse you do… but with a shield its normally already clean enough… but say with a sword you’d need prims to make it alot cleaner…

item.title: Shield of Curruption
item.dc:creator: @someone2 someone2
item.description:
@someone2 wrote:

[quote=“the wanderer, post:14, topic:378954”][quote author=someone2 link=topic=474810.msg3472196#msg3472196 date=1295379905]

What’s its amount of polygons?

i dono exactly but its under 300

Under 300? Than it won’t be a problem if this is gonna be used for games, lol. If u can make some better models with also low poly, and possible textured, u can earn money with it.

shields always have low poly… its the swords and armour that take up all the poly… i take it you havnt seen most my models?

No, i havnt. But if you mean you can make some very good models, I would really try selling 'em.
[/quote]
Nobody would buy them. Just saying. These are about the quality of free models. Not trying to bash anyones dreams, but its the honest truth. That samus armor that someone posted was a free model. So… yeah.[/quote]
That’s also why i said if u can make better ones. I saw companies like realm crafter sell things like this. It was like $10-15 for a sword/shield. It were beter models than this shields etc, but i just mean, with hard work and good models, it is possible.

Read full topic
